title: LA-18-15: Release of OGE’s Updated Public Financial Disclosure Guide and Confidential Financial Disclosure Guide
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/DAF127D61DE7D027852585BA005BEC2A/$FILE/LA-18-15 Release of OGE’s Updated Public Financial Disclosure Guide and Confidential Financial Disclosure Guide.pdf?open
summary: This Legal Advisory announces the release of a revised Public Financial Disclosure Guide and Confidential Financial Disclosure Guide and outlines the changes to both guides. A revision of the guides was necessitated by the revision of 5 C.F.R. part 2634, which contains the rules for Executive branch financial disclosure.
